ARCHIVED SIGMET OF: 20191202 // FROM: 0 TO: 23  UTC
SIGMET REGION: CONV-CENT_US 
AIRSPACE REQUESTED: ALL*

=======================================================================
WSUS31 KKCI 020055
SIGE
MKCE WST 020055
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 1E
VALID UNTIL 0255Z
PA
FROM 10NNE EWC-10SW JST
DMSHG LINE EMBD TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 23025KT. TOPS TO FL240.
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 2E
VALID UNTIL 0255Z
MA CT NY
FROM 20ESE ALB-30NW PVD-30N HTO-40NNE SAX-20ESE ALB
DVLPG AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 20030KT. TOPS TO FL280.
OUTLOOK VALID 020255-020655
AREA 1...FROM 100SSW YSJ-200SE ACK-160SE SIE-60ENE SYR-100SSW YSJ
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
AREA 2...FROM 140SSE ILM-220ENE OMN-100E OMN-100ENE CRG-140SSE
ILM
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
